Summary: 20 Minute Skillet Blackened Shrimp Fajitas are such an easy and flavorful meal packed with blackened shrimp, peppers and onion. This classic meal is perfect served up in tortillas with avocado and chopped cilantro!
Ingredients: 1 pound peeled and deveined large shrimp
avocado chopped cilantro, sour cream optional garnish
Instructions: In a large bowl, add the shrimp, chili powder, paprika, onion powder, cumin, garlic powder, and salt and pepper. Set aside.

In a medium-sized skillet over medium high heat, add 1 tablespoon olive oil and the sliced bell peppers and onion. Saute until tender about 5-7 minutes. Slide the cooked vegetables to the side of the skillet.
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil and add the seasoned shrimp. Cook for 2-3 minutes or until pink.
Serve in tortillas with optional toppings.
